title: Potatoe Pancakes
story: Easy to make, very good when served with cottage cheese and smoked salmon or with a dollop of sour cream

ingredients.name: potatoes
ingredients.preparationNotes: I usualy use mid size Russet potatoes

instructions: Peel and grate potatoes (you can use either finest side of hand grater or fine grater disk on a food processor).
Drain some liquid, do not overdo it, the batter should stay very moist.
Add lighly beaten egg and milk.
Serve with sour cream or ketchup.
For more fancier version - serve with cottage cheese and smoked salmon
